targets.expr: (sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{ namespace="$namespace2", pod=~"dep-anton-rest.*"}) by (pod) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{ namespace="$namespace2", pod=~"dep-anton-rest.*"}) by (pod)) * 100

(sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{ namespace="$namespace2", pod=~"dep-anton-highcpu.*"}) by (pod) / sum(cluster:namespace:pod_cpu:active:kube_pod_container_resource_limits{ namespace="$namespace2", pod=~"dep-anton-highcpu.*"}) by (pod)) * 100
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace2", container!="", image!="", pod=~"dep-anton-highcpu.*"} / 1000000) by (pod)

panels.title: Memory Usage per Pod - Anton - highCPU

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace2", container!="", image!="", pod=~"dep-anton-rest.*"} / 1000000) by (pod)

panels.title: Memory Usage per Pod - Anton - Others

targets.expr: sum by(namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace1", container!="POD", image!=""})
sum by(namespace) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace2", container!="POD", image!=""})
